casebody.data:
IMO the ADOPTION OF a Child by D.C.H. and R.K.H, M-1391/1392 September Term 2017
081319 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 22, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of D.C.H. and R.K.H. for leave to appeal (M-1391) is granted and the matter is remanded to the trial court for reconsideration of the issue of supervised visitation after the trial court reviews the Division of Child Protection and Permanency's files related to B.F.'s other children. The remand proceedings shall be conducted on an expedited schedule; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for stay (M-1392) is continued pending the trial court's reconsideration of the visitation order on remand. Jurisdiction is not retained.
